text: @DavidBrodyCBN @realDonaldTrump It was the wrong thing to do in the first place gathering a large crowd together, in an indoor space, during a global pandemic. A crowd that you knew would refuse to wear masks!  Utterly irresponsible for a leader of a country that is still in in 1st wave of Covid-19 and surging.
